queries: A variant hand of this can be made with the subordinate Point (G) handshape.
particleLexeme: 1. Used after a verb (action) sign to mean the action takes place around the clock, longer than is usual or continuously.
2. Used after the sign work to mean the work is in addition to your normal working hours. English = overtime.
nominalLexeme: 1. Time that you spend at your job in addition to your normal working hours. English = overtime.
